text: I wholeheartedly recommend the Doctor! The visit took place in a very pleasant and calm atmosphere. The Doctor explained everything thoroughly, dispelled our doubts, and patiently answered every question. My son (we were there for removal of a lesion near the lips) said he didn't expect it to be so simple and almost unnoticeable. Now he claims he will only go to the Doctor and to no one else. Thank you for your professionalism, empathy, and warm approach!
